ISSUE.TITLE: CheckoutAttributes are not encoded correctly in PDF
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.6 Steps to reproduce the problem: - Create a CheckoutAttribute containing umlaute (äöü) - Create order containing containing the previously created CheckoutAttribute - Download invoice for previously created order. Umlaute will not be encoded / displayed correctly inside the created pdf. ![image](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/assets/12660121/bea8b8df-1ecc-4d20-baf7-c5c5cfa72f98)
